Document.TEXT: Â Your global project carrier Welcome to BBC Chartering, a world leader in the ocean carriage of heavy lift and project cargoes. We support leading clients with our fleet of currently 170 multi-purpose and heavy lift vessels. Our global organization helps charterers to plan and execute transport assignments on tramp, affreightment or liner services around the world. The BBC Chartering fleet portfolio ranges from 3,500 to 37,300dwat and features lifting capacities up to 900mt. Any capacity can be assigned to project requirements and hence guarantees a reliable, efficient, yet flexible transport solution engineered to charterer demands.
